variables.label: MySQL User Password
variables.description: User password for the database instance.

variables.label: Leantime Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/leantime/leantime

variables.label: Timezone
variables.description: This is the timezone for the application, find yours at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

instructions.start:
Leantime is an open source project management system for small teams and startups written in PHP, Javascript using MySQL. Designed to help you manage your projects from ideation to delivery.

See more details here at https://leantime.io
instructions.end:
‚úÖ  Leantime has been successfully deployed and will soon be available at https://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain!

‚ùóÔ∏è **IMPORTANT**: Before accessing the Leantime dashboard, you must enable HTTPS:

**Step 1**: Go to the settings for `$$cap_appname`
**Step 2**: Enable **HTTPS**

--------------------------------------------

description: Leantime is an open source project management system for small teams and startups written in PHP, Javascript using MySQL.
documentation: More information on initial configuration can be found at https://docs.leantime.io/#/. This template was developed using variables from https://github.com/Leantime/docker-leantime/blob/master/docker-compose.yml
